title: Workshop on Inclusive Virtual Distance Education Accessibility Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and understanding of educational technology
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environments for current practitioners, applying the BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) approach.

learning_goals: Explain at least three principles of inclusive instructional design for learners with diverse backgrounds
Diagnose accessibility barriers in mobile environments and propose solutions
Develop implementation plans applying inclusive strategies to real-world educational scenarios through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
